name: Train Dilemma Director
description:
Today is the start of your new job at Train Conundrum Contractors! Your morals and wit will come in very handy as you learn the ropes of balancing the value of peoples lives. You alone get to decide between life and death for the people that fall under your responsibility. Have fun!

Made on 7/2/2022 with the theme "you can't stop" given to me by my friend Subsical
